website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and classy Clarks sandal for a low price.
pros: Closed-toe design and quality construction make these a great summer shoe
They offer more protection than their open-toed counterparts
Many customers noted the comfortable design
cons: Customers noted that these may squeak loudly on some surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Ver poor quality for a Clarks sandal
customer_reviews.text: Clarks shoes are great! These look very similar to the sandals,that I usually purchase. But not this one, the elastic expansion joints are poorly designed and one broke after few days of casual wear in the house and the yard (see the picture). Apparently the other elastic joints would have a similar fate soon. Seems they are doing a fire sale for a poor quality shoe -the price was low for a Clarks
customer_reviews.author: Via Cancion

customer_reviews.title: so I was happy to find the same brand and style as the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to replace his worn out pair after years of wear. I couldn't find them locally, so I was happy to find the same brand and style as his old ones, since these are the only ones he likes. Regardless of what style you get, Clarks are quality shoes.
customer_reviews.author: KristieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: High quality sandal
customer_reviews.text: Just received the sandals. They are of the same high quality I have come to expect from Clarks over the years, especiallly the leather. While many companies have gone for a cheaper leather, Clarks has not. Fits great, marvelous sole, and nicely contoured insole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a recent trip to Portugal to replace his well loved Merrels. the look and fit of these shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for a recent trip to Portugal to replace his well loved Merrels. the look and fit of these shoes are great but the only complaint we both have is that they are horribly, terribily squeaky! The ssqueak was so obvious my husband even took them off when visiting quiet churches. It didn't seem to matter what service we were on--the squeak was VERY loud. It may be the function of this one shoe rather than the design but do beware to try them out first on a few different surfaces should you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Midwife Barb

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with the company that sold me them.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is great. Crappy company that sold it to me. I owned the same sandal for years without problems. The elastic that connects the leather near the toe ripped on this pair without hitting the sandal. The company refused to take the sandal back though I only used it maybe 10 times.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Sandals - Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love Clark sandals. I have owed several pair in past. I walked all over Europe in them... never a problem. True quality. But these sandals sold by Sole Connect... horrible. I purchased 4 months ago. They fit fine and seemed fine for first 2 months. Then, I notice fraying and seams coming loose. And, finally... they became useless after only 4 months when the ankle strap pulled loose from the base of the sandal. I have had better quality shoes from Walmart. I sent message to seller.... no response. I am reporting seller to Better Business Bureau as they must be knock-offs. Horrible Sandals - Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: fell apart after wearing 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were the same ones my husband bought 2 years ago. I think these must have been sitting in a hot warehouse for the last 2 years. Glue on both sandals let go on the straps for the back of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Carmel gal

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoe well enough but it has a toe ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe well enough but it has a toe groove and my toes don't quite fit in the groove. It is still comfortable enough to wear, but I don't understand why companies ever sandals with toe indentations, since they probably don't fit most peoples toes.
customer_reviews.author: AM87

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, quite comfortable, but embarrassingly noisy on hard linoleum floors
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look and quite comfortable even without socks (too tight with socks). BUT... the rubber outsoles with the hexagon pattern were VERY squeaky (embarrassingly noisy) on the hard linoleum hallways at work and elsewhere. Tried baby powder...didn’t help. Tried a bar of soap...only a very temporary solution. Finally returned them to Shoe Parlor for a refund and bought something else. Wish they would've had a different outsole and a size 10-1/2 would've been available.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn J.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Comfort and support
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Clarke sandals. They are so comfortable. They give me support with comfort. I used to wear my old ones around the house. I wear these everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: TAJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the style but shoe is a a half size too big but still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P. Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: I wore a pair exactly like thse for 6-7 years
customer_reviews.text: I wore a pair exactly like thse for 6-7 years. They were not close to wearing out but one of the supporting straps pulled away from where it was glued between the sole and the pad. I weigh 200 lbs and get very good support so I ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Great sandal. I have diabetes so shoes are my enemy. This provide good support and fit loosely enough to accommodate my foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Not like other Clarks shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sandals for my dad. Not like other Clark shoes, this sandal is pretty heavy. Even thought my dad likes the style, but he feel way too clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: Endofjuly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Went hiking & the shoes were very comfortable. I always purchase that brand for it's realibility.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my husband & I have not ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband & I have not heard any complaints about the fit or even the looks. I believe he likes them & I was hoping they would offer more of these in various colors.
customer_reviews.author: littlegracii2004

customer_reviews.title: Still love Clark's, despite squeaky soles
customer_reviews.text: Always buy Clark's. Fit well, Comfortable support, Long lasting. This is the first pair I've bought that squeaks on bare floors, which is what I'm on all day. Disappointed by that, change in rubber type?
customer_reviews.author: Tom Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality Sandals
customer_reviews.text: These European made sandals are very high quality, comfortable and fit true to size. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sandals! Very comfortable, even after wearing all day.
customer_reviews.author: KJB7486

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals and purchased at a price comparable to Designed Shoe Warehouse (DSW).
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: So comfy- A++
customer_reviews.text: Im a 10.5 and had to purchase 11's, but these are SO comfy and I really love them. Great gift from wife
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: My second pair and the first pair (several years old) are still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Hunt

customer_reviews.title: The best sandals ever
customer_reviews.text: The best sandals ever. Comfortable right out of the box. My last pair lasted 10 years. Still wear them to work in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Koiner

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! Very comfortable. Plan on taking them with me to India and Uganda later this week.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Streit

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable sandal. Always been happy with Clark's shoes
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very comfortable sandal. Always been happy with Clark's shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mantra mom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sandals were too hard on the feet. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Terrific comfort and excellent fit
customer_reviews.text: Terrific comfort, and excellent fit! These casual sandals are a nice dark color so they go well with light or dark pants or shorts. Great for walking or just hanging out. These are my second pair. They do not diasappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are slightly smaller then what they have been in the past.
customer_reviews.author: JHS

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice and my husband likes them
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice and my husband likes them. The only problem is that they squeak as he walks. It is quite annoying
customer_reviews.author: Nana63

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality of material .. Cut after couple of usages
customer_reviews.text: very poor material .. I bought this sandal and i live abroad. The rubber parts got torn and cut after using it for a couple of times. Here are pictures of how it looks like now. It's brand new. They should send me another one or a refund
customer_reviews.author: Kash

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little too stiff. I also find it hard to adjust Velcro strap
customer_reviews.author: Vic Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: My third set. Willing to try again but previous ...
customer_reviews.text: My third set. Willing to try again but previous pair strap on foot tore after about 1 year of minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Skaggs

customer_reviews.title: Bad, bad quality!!! Men's Clarks Jensen Fisherman Sandals Brown, BROWN, 10M(D)
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very bad. I bought those shoes for my husband in November 2012. After 2 month of wearing one shoe was broken. We fixed it, and one month passed and another shoe was broken and the sole was cracked. After 3 months they are totally trash. Actually we love Clarks products but not these shoes which we ordered from the company Bare Sole Sandals. I strongly don't recommend buying shoes from that company.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: I am on my second pair
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of sandals. The first one I had started to get velcro straps separated after like 5 years:) I could probably have repaired them, but decided to get a new pair instead. Quality is very similar. They look good, too. Sturdy, feel right, and comfortable. I have paid $300 before on a complete junk sandals from a major department store - this is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: julianrz

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best.  Comfort and extreme durability.
customer_reviews.text: I have had an identical black pair for about seven years now, and the darn things are indestructible and VERY comfortable. This sandal is serious sandal made of best quality leather....designed for comfort and durability. I put on the new brown pair and wore them all day without worry. I give them a five star rating for a reason. Don't pass up these sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Enthusiasm enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are a replacement for another pair that I wore out. I came back for seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald D Addington

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: they were perfect until my husband died. These were his type of shoe and he was so excited to have them then he up and died on me! But if this is your style these are your shoe! Can't go wrong with Clark's.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine, Impress of Z Internet

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with the shoes is they seem to only last 6 to 10 months ... then the back strap will pull from the shoe and you lose stability. If they fix that problem I would be very happy. They are very comfortable though :)
customer_reviews.author: Butcher Bob

customer_reviews.title: Look great, fairly comfortable, but very noisy on some surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Decent comfort, but when wearing without socks, there are some rough edges that rub uncomfortably. Socks help a lot. Also, they're quite noisy on certain surfaces (like floors of some stores like Target), making a loud, squeaky sound. However, they look great on the feet and are fairly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stout one
customer_reviews.text: first time in clarks jensen sandles what a suprise strong build size true with good support can wear all day will buy these again
customer_reviews.author: STOUT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product service and value. Thanks very much. - John Conover
customer_reviews.author: John H. Conover

customer_reviews.title: ... product because I didn't want to cover up the beautiful wood of the stairs but needed something to help ...
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because I didn't want to cover up the beautiful wood of the stairs but needed something to help prevent slipping. Easy to apply, looked and worked great. The only problem I found is that air bubbles formed after applying. Not sure if it was because of humidity or what.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good But
customer_reviews.text: . He loved them. Good shoes but after some time of wearing it for sum reason it makes your feet smell very bad
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Remake Jensen Fisherman Casual Sandal's.
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing many of the Jensen Fisherman Sandals for many years, very comfortable. Have tried other Clark Sandals, but they do not live up to the Jensen sandal's. There are not many to be found on the market now. I do believe Clarks have stopped making them and wish Clarks would remake the Jensen sandal's again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: clarks sandals
customer_reviews.text: I started wearing Clarks a few years back, and now I will not wear any other brand. This is my second pair of these sandals. They wear great and fit well. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dj

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small, but great comfort if you go up a size.
customer_reviews.text: Normally I wear a 9, but the Clarks 9 is too small in this sandal. The 10 is a bit too big, but that's not a bad thing in a sandal that I wanted to be comfortable in. A 9.5 would have been perfect, but I couldn't find any half sizes. This is my second pair. The first pair finally wore out after many years. The weak link was the lining on the inside of the shoe. It wore though at the heel and started to fray. I'm expecting many more years from this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Swick

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box! I would recommend. Quick shipping and packaged nicely. I gave a five based on comfort with no "break in" period
customer_reviews.author: Bill Gallo

customer_reviews.title: never reciver the sandals
customer_reviews.text: where are the sandalsI need these due to the fact that in 2 weeks i will be in vietnam.how can i rate a product that i have not recived
customer_reviews.author: daniel bracken

customer_reviews.title: Sandals with class
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these I have purchased for my Hubby because we both like them. He likes the way the Clarks feel and I like the way they look. He can wear them out to dinner in the summer without looking under dressed.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Russell

customer_reviews.title: False promise--wrong product shipped
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a pair of CLARKS Jensen Sandals, however I was shipped CLUB ROOM sandals of very inferior quality. The funny thing is this product was packed in a CLARKS box and the invoice still said CLARKS sandals. I had planned to gift the sandals to my husbad but now I am returning it. I would have given zero stars if it was possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: CLARKS Mens Jensen Fisherman Sandal
product_meta.description: Cool your feet with the Clarks Jensen fisherman sandal. Ruggedly built to take punishment, this sporty mens sandal features a woven full grain leather upper lined with moisture-wicking polyester and neoprene for a healthy, comfortable foot environment. An adjustable ankle strap with hook-and-loop closure allows a customizable fit; contrast stitching details add interest. The Clarks Jensen sandal is finished with a durable rubber outsole for traction and long-lasting support.
